1. The colors will only show up if the values are available in the grid.

2. Yes. Use the test points and Grasshopper's text tag.

3. Yes. You can use plugins like [weaver bird](http://www.giuliopiacentino.com/weaverbird/) to create a more smooth mesh.

4. [CIE sky component has an input for skyType](https://mostapharoudsari.gitbooks.io/honeybee-primer/content/text/components/Generate_Standard_CIE_Sky.html).
